text: Kassim Majaliwa Majaliwa (born 22 December 1960) is a Tanzanian politician. He is the Prime Minister of Tanzania since 2015. He was appointed by President John Magufuli after the 2015 general election. He is a member of the ruling Chama Cha Mapinduzi party and has been a Member of Parliament for Ruangwa constituency since 2010. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Tanzania Category:Current national leaders
title: Kassim Majaliwa
